error.signature: error returned from database: migration checksum mismatch for migration

verdict.summary: An already-applied migration was modified. SQLx stores checksums to ensure migration integrity.

dead_ends.action: Delete the _sqlx_migrations table to re-run all migrations
dead_ends.why_fails: Re-running CREATE TABLE migrations on existing tables causes SQL errors; data may be lost

workarounds.action: Create a new migration with the corrective changes instead of modifying the existing one
workarounds.how:
sqlx migrate add fix_previous_migration
# Write ALTER TABLE or corrective SQL in the new migration

workarounds.action: For development only: drop and recreate the database
workarounds.how:
sqlx database drop
sqlx database create
sqlx migrate run

leads_to.condition: When database issues lead to connection troubleshooting

preceded_by.condition: When connection is established and migrations are run

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Connection error means database is unreachable; migration error means migrations are inconsistent after connection succeeds
